original_text: ‘You will see strange things happen to the sun and to the moon and to the stars. Down on earth, things that happen will make people in many countries very afraid. The sea will move up and down and make a lot of noise. There will be great storms.
korean_text: 일월 성신에는 징조가 있겠고 땅에서는 민족들이 바다와 파도의 성난 소리로 인하여 혼란한 중에 곤고하리라

sentences.original_text: You will see strange things happen to the sun
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 해에게 이상한 일이 일어나는 것을 볼 것이다

sentences.original_text: things that happen will make people in many countries very afraid
sentences.korean_translation: 일어나는 일들은 여러 나라 사람들을 매우 두렵게 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: The sea will move up and down
and make a lot of noise
